dialogues.name: Dad
dialogues.content: Vincent, your mother and I have been talking about your upcoming exams…

dialogues.name: Dad
dialogues.content: ...We believe in you, son. We know you’re doing your best.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Belief without results is meaningless, Richard.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Vincent, we have sacrificed everything to give you these opportunities. It is your duty to ensure that it was not for nothing. We expect you to succeed.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I understand, Mom. I won’t let you down.

dialogues.name: Dad
dialogues.content: Vincent, we want you to remember that no matter what happens, you are our son, and we will always love you.
